text: tīrccayāyuṁ pravācakanṟeyuṁ, ñerukkattinṟe ghaṭṭattil addēhatte pintuṭarnnavarāya muhājiṟukaḷuṭeyuṁ ansāṟukaḷuṭeyuṁ nēre allāhu kaniññ maṭaṅṅiyirikkunnu-avaril ninn oru vibhāgattinṟe hr̥dayaṅṅaḷ teṟṟippēākumāṟāyatinu śēṣaṁ. enniṭṭ allāhu avaruṭe nēre kaniññu maṭaṅṅi. tīrccayāyuṁ avan avarēāṭ ēṟe kr̥payuḷḷavanuṁ karuṇānidhiyumākunnu
